name: Handicapped Orphans Living Yerd Working Organization for Rural Development Society(HOLYWORDS)
briefDescription: It is a Non Profit and Non Political a women Headed Organization.We are given Loans to Disabled persons- 100We Conducted Awareness programmes in Health(Ex;Iodine Deficiency, Water pollution, & Malaria Fevers)-300Formation of Disabled Groups-100Formation of SHG(Women)-300We provided Vocational Training in Tailoring And Computers.
